name: Skullpogo
description:
The hordes of undead are invading!

Zombies, bloodthirsty bats, and... vampire PIGS? It's time to deal with these vile cretins using your secret weapon: a POGO stick!

+ Explosive power-ups!

+ Huge combo chains!

+ Leaderboards and dozens of achievements!

+ 3 different worlds to master!

+ Play the catchy soundtrack, or pogo to your own tunes!
